trans-unit.source: An activity used to explicitly invoke the confirmation handler of a <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 활동의 확인 처리기를 명시적으로 호출 하는 데 사용 된 <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Confirm"></xref> class.

Gets or sets the <xref:System.WorkflowModel.InArgument%601> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Confirm"></xref> activity.

When the Target of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> is specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> activity explicitly invokes the confirmation handler of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>, which returns the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>.
trans-unit.target: 때의 대상은 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>지정 된 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm>활동의 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> 를 반환 하는</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> 의 확인 처리기를 명시적으로 호출</xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>

trans-unit.source: When the Target of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> is not specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> activity executes the default confirmation for any child <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> activities in the reverse order of successful completion.
trans-unit.target: 때의 대상은 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>를 지정 하지 않으면는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm>활동이 실행 모든 자식에 대 한 기본 확인 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>성공적으로 완료 순서와 반대로 활동.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown if the Target refers to a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> that was previously confirmed or compensated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>대상 참조 하는 경우 throw 되는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>를 이전에 확인 되었거나 보정.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is raised.
The <xref:System.WorkflowModel.InArgument%601> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Confirm"></xref> activity.
